alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Smith; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 20 at 7:26PM CDT until April 20 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Smith County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Upshur County in northeastern Texas... West central Gregg County in northeastern Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 726 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles northeast of Tyler, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Gladewater, Big Sandy, Clarksville City and Winona. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
